pageDescription: Here you can access contract information about the various tokens in the Synthetix Network.

tokens.description: Gets staked as collateral to back Synths and entitles stakers to receive fees generated by Synth trades on Synthetix.Exchange.
Tracks the price of the U.S. Dollar through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Euro through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Australian Dollar through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Korean Won through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Japanese Yen through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Swiss Franc through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the British Pound through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Chinese Yuan through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Singapore Dollar through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of the Canadian Dollar through price feeds supplied by an oracle.

Tracks the price of Gold (per ounce) through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of Silver (per ounce) through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of Bitcoin through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of Ether through price feeds supplied by an oracle.
Tracks the price of Binance Coin through price feeds supplied by an oracle.

Inversely tracks the price of Bitcoin through price feeds supplied by an oracle. Its value freezes when it reaches its upper limit of $12600 (i.e. when Bitcoin’s value reaches $4200) or its lower limit of $4200 (i.e. when Bitcoin’s value reaches $12600). If it reaches either of its limits and gets frozen, it will no longer be able to be purchased on Synthetix.Exchange, but can still be traded for other Synths at its frozen value. At some point after it has reached either of its limits, it will be substituted for another iBTC with different limits.

Inversely tracks the price of Ether through price feeds supplied by an oracle. Its value freezes when it reaches its upper limit of $390 (i.e. when Ether’s value reaches $130) or its lower limit of $130 (i.e. when Ether’s value reaches $390). If it reaches either of its limits and gets frozen, it will no longer be able to be purchased on Synthetix.Exchange, but can still be traded for other Synths at its frozen value. At some point after it has reached either of its limits, it will be substituted for another iETH with different limits.

Inversely tracks the price of Binance Coin through price feeds supplied by an oracle. Its value freezes when it reaches its upper limit of $38 (i.e. when Binance Coin’s value reaches $13) or its lower limit of $13 (i.e. when Binance Coin’s value reaches $13). If it reaches either of its limits and gets frozen, it will no longer be able to be purchased on Synthetix.Exchange, but can still be traded for other Synths at its frozen value. At some point after it has reached either of its limits, it will be substituted for another iBNB with different limits.
